document.full_text: the british oil giant said it plans to seek court permission to go ahead with just half of its rosneft agreement while it looks for ways to resolve problems with its other partners in russia.
document.title: bp seeks to salvage russia deal after tribunal ruling
lines_and_colors: the british oil giant said it plans to seek court permission to go ahead with just half of its rosneft agreement while it looks for ways to resolve problems with its other partners in russia.
